DEMO_611_MSG_010:
̂Thank you ȁ... 
For clearing the way here for me.
DEMO_611_MSG_170:
̂I'm going to become a superior Monster Master that rises above everyone! Just like what Carmasso dreamed of.
ā
DEMO_611_MSG_020:
̂From here on out, the rest is on me. 
I have to do this... for the sake of our world.
DEMO_611_MSG_180: ̂I won't let you interfere! Gahaha... gahahahahahaha!!
DEMO_611_MSG_030:
̂I sure hope this works... this antibody we developed
should be strong enough to rid Mother of her infection.
DEMO_611_MSG_060: ̂Groh-hoh-hoh! That's too bad. You're a few seconds too late, little lady!
DEMO_611_MSG_080:
̂Groh-hoh-hoh! You wish to know what I am? 
Well then... allow me to fill you in!
ā
DEMO_611_MSG_090:
̂There once was a man, Carmasso, who researched Darkonium. 
He opened a gateway to Hell, and ended up becoming a monster himself.
DEMO_611_MSG_100:
̂Carmasso was ultimately defeated by this Monster Master... however, his corruption never truly faded away.
ā
DEMO_611_MSG_110: ̂This corruption took the form of dark matter and spread throughout the world. It continued to manifest as malevolent crystals, known as Darkonium.
DEMO_611_MSG_120:
̂This is bad... Carmasso's hatred essentially manifested
itself into Darkonium, and, in turn... infected Mother... ?
DEMO_611_MSG_130:
̂Precisely! And with the power to create and maintain an
entire planet, I figured I'd use some of it to make a new body!
DEMO_611_MSG_140: ̂I am a new creation, born from Carmasso's malevolence. My name is... Snapped-off!!
DEMO_611_MSG_150: ̂Snapped-off... no, that can't be. Dark matters can have wills of their own!?
DEMO_611_MSG_160:
̂I won't let you purify Mother! Not while I am able to stop you!
ā
